short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Save And Restore Your Pinned Tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your pinned tabs in style! 

3 Save Slots and 3 buttons. 

This intuitive extension does exactly what you need, with a user-friendly interface! 

Every pin needs SuperGlue.

Updates
--------------------------------

Removing all tabs on delete is bugged so feature has been shelved for now. 

Currently selected save slot is saved so radio button preselects on last selection. 

Fixed issue where indicator turned green while saving with no pinned tabs.

Changed method of storage to use the bookmarks system, for data persistence in the event the user clears browser data.

Fixed an issue where the pinned tabs would reset in save slot, when no tabs were present.
